column4: after upgrading to kernel 2.6.19 my IDE devices are detected as /dev/sdx. how can i make the kernel recognise it as /dev/hdx?
how did you upgrade? what you describe sound very unusual
i recompiled the latest kernel using the config of 2.6.18.. am i missing some thing?
It sounds like a misconfigured kernel
as i told you before i used the config of previous version and made few more changes for the latest ie. added few stat drivers
you didn't tell me how you did it
did you just copy the .config then make?
go over make menuconfig again. I'm sure something is missing/misconfigured
what kind of hdd is it? pata/sata?
then something is certainly misconfigured/missing or not loaded
i've read somewhere that few ide drivers have been upgraded which creates this problem. is there any way to use the old ide drivers?
hmm. you probably need to revert that particular patch then. might be hard to locate
where did you read it? it sounds like a pretty bad bug to me
